Reviews.Title: Great for Photos and Videos
Reviews.Author: Aaron Zahn
Reviews.Content: I've had my 5R for maybe a month and a half now, and so far it's been really great. One thing that I like about it that I'm not sure that other cameras have is the ability to shoot video in manual mode. With this you can choose the ISO, aperture, and most importantly (for me) shutter speed of the video, which I didn't really think would matter much at first, but I do alot of filming parkour stuff and when your slowing down 60 fps footage to get some slow motion the high shutter speed will make your video nice and crisp. I also found out that I enjoy photography a lot more then I thought I would when I got this camera, I hadn't done a lot of it before I got this camera, but I've found myself pulling off roads now just to take pictures of things now.I don't like that I can't see the screen that well on bright days, so a viewfinder could be nice, but at the same time I can't see myself taking the video with my eye up to one because I dont really like the body height angle alot of the time. One other thing is that it has no external audio in on it and the buit in mic is not great, this lost it a star because now I have to either buy their $120 shogun mic or another audio solution.I would reccomend this to anyone. I don't really have a great perspective of this vs other cameras but for the money and size of the camera, it shoots awesome photo/video and I'm more than happy with it. As I said earlier the only reason it got 1 star off is because there's no external audio port, but I've been thinking about getting something portable with a lapel mic anyways so it's not a huge deal.Hope my review helped. It's 3:30 AM so sorry if I ended up talking around myself haha.

Reviews.Title: Best Camera I have ever owned
Reviews.Author: Justin Garrard
Reviews.Content: Picked up this camera just before leaving for France where my company was sending my wife and I for 3 months.We ended up taking ≈8,500 pics with it in those three months, and have been completely happy with the ease of use of the camera, size, and most importantly incredible quality of pictures that it took all over the diverse photographic subjects that the European continent could provide.Some of the items in the extra kit weren't as useful as others, but the price compared to the brick and mortar stores can't be beat.I highly recommend this camera to anyone wanting to take a step up from the point and shoot realm, but not wanting to drag around a giant National Geographic Explorer style DSLR.My only warning though... the 5R is great as I have said... however it ends up making you want to do better and better, so don't be surprised if a NEX 6 or 7 are in your future!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: M. Guigou
Reviews.Content: Very impressed with the quality, features, etc.You won't be disappointed! Buy a tripod and some other accessories and you will be almost a pro ;)

Reviews.Title: Pleased with the product.
Reviews.Author: James Travis
Reviews.Content: Great image quality. Too many good features to list. Nice to put old Leica, Nikon and Pentax lenses back to work with adapters. A few are superb. The Sony kit lens does a fine job. I use it most often. Menu learning curve is a little steep - you walk before you run. Wi-fi linking to laptop could be a lot easier and more complete. USB jack came loose after a few weeks but warranty repair was outstandingly rapid.  Get extra batteries and the wall charger. If you don't want to spring for the NEX-6 or 7, this is the NEX series fallback. Absolutely pleased with the product.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: M. Johnsen
Reviews.Content: I choose this camera based on the recommendation of 2 other people that had it.  The camera is very easy to use.  I like the additional software features such as WIFI and easy transfer to my iPhone.  I would like to add a zoom lens down the road since the one that came with the camera is average.  I recommend this camera to anybody that is not a huge expert in photography!

Reviews.Title: Truly a great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: David W
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy this camera.  The size belies the options available.  This camera has several options you'd only see in a larger camera.  The size is great, but it will not fit in your pocket.  The lens makes sure of that.  The picture quality is excellent and will save in RAW format for the Photoshop crowd.  I wouldn't call this an amateur product, but more of an entry-level professional camera.  For those of you who are looking to enter photography, great camera.  For those of us who aspire to take pictures other than our dog (okay, most of mine are of the dog), this camera is probably way more than we would ever need.Pros:  Professional level camera at a decent price.Cons:  Will not fit in your pocket.  If you have lenses from other non-Sony cameras, don't expect to reuse them here.  All of the lenses for my Canon DSLR did not fit on this camera even with the convertor.  If you already have lenses, I strongly encourage you to see if they will fit otherwise you'll need to buy them again.

Reviews.Title: Great camera BUT I should have bought the NEX6
Reviews.Author: MexicoRealtor
Reviews.Content: Really enjoying the size of the camera. It is MUCH smaller than my Nikon D300s AND I can use the lenses I already own. I bought a lens adapter and can manually use my Nikon lenses. The NEX5R has a great visual utility to show you what is in focus so the manual thing is not a big deal. I REALLY am missing the viewfinder though. Doing it all again, I would buy the NEX6. Spend the extra cash if you can.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding camera
Reviews.Author: Maj Michael Sullenger Ret
Reviews.Content: versatile and easy to use.  Picture quality is tops. Would encourage anyone interested in a great camera to consider this one.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera and !Extras!
Reviews.Author: M. Goold
Reviews.Content: Camera was bought mainly to take baby, family, and vacation photos. It has taken great pictures and makes it easy to get quality photos. Takes a little time to figure out, for us who were not too familiar with the numerous modes and functions. We have not used the video capability. For the same cost of the camera alone this package is wonderful. I definitely recommend this.

Reviews.Title: camera is OK, attachments are not very good
Reviews.Author: wsma02
Reviews.Content: the camera works good, but several attachments are not from the SONY company. Further more, the card reader cannot work, and there is no data link to conect to the computer. and i chat with the AMAZON, they cannot change the card reader for me. That is rather trouble.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Images and Video, Awful Audio
Reviews.Author: T. Gehman
Reviews.Content: I will keep this short as there are already loads of helpful reviews and comparisons. I love my Nex-5R and the bundle deal was a bonus. The pictures and videos are phenomenal considering it's size. However, there is a major design flaw - the audio.The onboard mics are not stellar to start with plus the metal rings on the neck strap cause an audible clicking sound when moving briskly. Sony offers an external mic which looks promising but I have read sub-par reviews of it. Studio quality audio is not to be expected from an onboard mic, we all know that, but most (maybe all) cameras marketed for high quality video have a way to input an external mic. Not the Nex5R. To make matters worse, the mini-hot shoe uses a digital communication protocol, so there's no hack-a-modding a mic into the pins. One brave modder cut up his external mic but even it cannot support true stereo. So now you know.Pros:Beautiful pictures and video*Loads of custom settingsSmall sizeInterchangeable lensesCons:Sad audio for the priceCannot charge battery while camera is onMenus could be more user friendlyI would gladly give 5 stars if Sony released an external audio input module. I'll be crossing my fingers.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: xinyuan
Reviews.Content: I like this product and there are cheap and very convenience to use. Nex 5r is a very good camera.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing Experience
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: I had this camera for about 2 days, I realize how this will sound but I set the camera down onto my granite counter top and the battery door broke off in a very uneventful fashion. I am a Mechanical Engineer and work with plastics, the door was either stressed before it arrived to me or made with "regrind" plastic.I spoke with Beach Camera about this, they gladly accepted the return, gave me the shipping tag, etc....and then tonight (a week later) I received the camera back with a "NOT ACCEPTED" note.I was NEVER contacted by Beach, I was pre-approved, and then furthermore, the return shipping was completely inadequate, there was no packing in the box, the camera was like a baby rattle!I don't know what to say accept I am really disappointed with their customer service. I told the first service rep right over the phone that the battery door broke off, why make me ship it back only to deny my claim?Hopefully when I call tomorrow they can help me rectify the situation, if so I will update this review.
